content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all photo tutorials in one printable file without advertisements there is also a bonus garment schematic included in the pdf the celsea button up crochet cardigan is an oversized cardigan with a slightly shaped front neck opening tapered sleeves knit-look ribbing along the bottom hem and cuffs and a knit-look buttonhole front edging size down for a more classic fitting cardigan and easily adjust the length if you prefer a long cardigan or crochet cropped cardigan this free crochet cardigan pattern ranges from sizes xs 5x purchase the kit here aff 2 lion brand also has a full kit of the celsea button up crochet cardigan available on their website the kit includes your choice of color and a digital copy of the pattern **sizing** the pattern is written in women s sizes x-small small medium large x-large 2x-large 3x-large 4x-large 5x-large to fit chest 28-30 32-34 36-38 40-42 44-46 48-50 52-54 56 - 58 60 - 62 **instructions included for lengthening the sleeves & torso ** **yarn** the sample in the photos was crocheted with lion brand wool ease recycled in olive 85 g / 3 oz / 196 yards / 179 m / 80% recycled acrylic / 20% recycled wool other worsted weight 4 yarns can be substituted as long as gauge is met **pattern notes** the pattern is a written pattern and also includes a schematic and photo tutorials where needed button up cardigan design is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity jennifer renaud all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions © 2023 designed by jennifer renaud aka a crocheted simplicity all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of a crocheted simplicity the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and charity sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to a crocheted simplicity is greatly appreciated no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from jennifer renaud 1 https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/button-up-crochet-cardigan-pattern/ 2 https //shrsl com/4axbp
